trashday.ui.responses

Class ResponseHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.ui.responses.ResponseHelpers
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResponsesExit, ResponsesHelp, ResponsesSchedule

    public class ResponseHelpers
extends Object
    Provides some "helper" functions that make the code more readable for all child classes.
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin
